name: BlockSmashDemo
description:
Demo version for the soon to be uploaded BlockSmash on google play.

Click enemies to rush against them and smash as much as possible!

Be sure to avoid bullets from triangles and DO NOT LET ANY ENEMY HIT THE BOTTOM.

As a demo,  the game has only one level, with the full version having 5 level, each with its own boss.

-as a non full time programmer, the project took me a lot of time, all the assets, including music, art and codes were made by me, so please consider a 1 dollar donation <3-
